about_the_game:
Project Kinesis is a video game that blends card game combat, dice rolling, and collectable elements.

Project Kinesis is a unique card game that integrates dice-rolling mechanics and strategic gameplay. In this game, each card has its own stats like life, damage, critical chance, and specific rules. The cards are divided into three main types:

  • Domains: Defend your terrain from enemy attacks.
  • Servants: Generate Kinesis, the game's main resource.
  • Combatants: Form your army to battle opponents.

With 200 unique cards, customizable avatars, and table play mats, players can immerse themselves in 19 story chapters, each featuring an animated intro.



Discover a world of strategies as you combine different factions to create your ultimate deck.

Project Kinesis offers innumerable possibilities for creating your own deck, allowing for a wide array of strategic combos and tactics. Each game can be different, providing fresh challenges and exciting gameplay every time. Dive into the world of Project Kinesis and discover the depth and complexity of its card mechanics, ensuring no two games are ever the same.



Join our community on Discord to discuss strategies, share tips, and connect with fellow players.

Project Kinesis is a unique card game that integrates dice-rolling mechanics and strategic gameplay. In this game, each card has its own stats like life, damage, critical chance, and specific rules. The cards are divided into three main types:

With 200 unique cards, customizable avatars, and table play mats, players can immerse themselves in 19 story chapters, each featuring an animated intro.



Discover a world of strategies as you combine different factions to create your ultimate deck.

Project Kinesis offers innumerable possibilities for creating your own deck, allowing for a wide array of strategic combos and tactics. Each game can be different, providing fresh challenges and exciting gameplay every time. name: Project Kinesis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core processor 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Quad-core processor 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Project Kinesis is a video game that blends card game combat, dice rolling, and collectable elements. Start by selecting your initial faction, then advance through each story chapter, collecting powerful cards to enhance your abilities.
